title: 怎么限制某个mcmmo技能的等级
author: g519403080

replies.author: Abraham511
replies.txt_content:
# 在这里设置单个能力的最高等级！！！
# 等级设置（Level_Cap）数值0 则没有限制
# 等级设置（Level_Cap）数值10 则上限为10级
# 等级设置（Level_Cap）数值14 则上限为14级
###
Skills:
Acrobatics:
Enabled_For_PVP: true
Enabled_For_PVE: true
Prevent_AFK_Leveling: true
Prevent_Dodge_Lightning: false
Level_Cap: 0
Archery:
Enabled_For_PVP: true
Enabled_For_PVE: true
Level_Cap: 0
Axes:
Enabled_For_PVP: true
Enabled_For_PVE: true
Level_Cap: 0
Excavation:
Level_Cap: 0
Fishing:
Drops_Enabled: true
Level_Cap: 0
Herbalism:
Level_Cap: 0
Prevent_AFK_Leveling: true
Mining:
Level_Cap: 0
Detonator_ID: 259
Repair:
Level_Cap: 0
Anvil_Messages: true
Anvil_ID: 42
Salvage_Anvil_ID: 41
Salvage_tools: true
Salvage_armor: true
Smelting:
Level_Cap: 0
Swords:
Enabled_For_PVP: true
Enabled_For_PVE: true
Level_Cap: 0
Taming:
Enabled_For_PVP: true
Enabled_For_PVE: true
Level_Cap: 0
Call_Of_The_Wild:
Bones_Required: 10
Fish_Required: 10
Unarmed:
Enabled_For_PVP: true
Enabled_For_PVE: true
Level_Cap: 0
Block_Cracker:
SmoothBrick_To_CrackedBrick: true
Woodcutting:
Level_Cap: 0

replies.author: penjing
replies.txt_content: 配置文件里 可以设置 最高等级的 经验 增加也可以设置 管看 LEVEL 相关

replies.author: g519403080
replies.txt_content:
penjing 发表于 2018-9-26 11:47
配置文件里 可以设置 最高等级的 经验 增加也可以设置 管看 LEVEL 相关
具体哪个配置文件 哪个配置
